channel.title: Comments on: Picasa Is Coming For The Mac

item.title: By: Picasa For The Mac Finally Available » Mac, Software » Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Picasa For The Mac Finally Available » Mac, Software » Russell Heimlich
item.description: [...] that Picasa for the Mac is finally ready. You can get it at http://picasa.google.com/mac/. I wrote about the rumors of Picasa on the Mac 10 days short of a year ago. The Mac version is nearly identical to [...]
